anya-e1207n:12: Tahiṃ, tahiṃ suvitthiṇṇaṃ jinassa caritaṃ hitaṃ;
anya-e1207n:46: Dhanasāraṃ ihaṃ gayha gantuṃ yuttanti me pana.
anya-e1207n:106: Iti taṃ janataṃ pucchi kasmā sodhetha añjasaṃ.
anya-e1207n:118: Iti sotassa so tassa sukhaṃ dento jano’braviṃ.
anya-e1207n:124: Labhitvā visamaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṃ kātuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e1207n:137: Dīgharattāma’laṃ taṃ me hitāya ca sukhāya ca;
anya-e1207n:144: Saṅghassa navako hutvā paviseyyaṃ puraṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1207n:147: Ayaṃ buddho’va’haṃ buddho hutvā loke anuttaro.
anya-e1207n:160: Āgantvāna tahiṃ ṭhānaṃ isiṃ paṅke nipannakaṃ;
anya-e1207n:169: Idaṃ vatvāna katvāna sasaṅgho taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e1207n:185: Kimuddhaṃ vā adho vā’pi disāsu vidisāsu ca.
anya-e1207n:193: Saṃsāre saṃsaranto so bahuṃ dukkhaṃ titikkhiya;
anya-e1207n:206: Kampayitvā mahiṃ dento sute cā’pi sakaṅgatāva.
anya-e1207n:402: Modiṃsu jalajā tasmiṃ jantavo pahasiṃsu ca.
anya-e1207n:438: ‘‘Jāto kira mahārāja putto te nuttaro sudhi.
anya-e1207n:451: Phāleyyamuddhā khalu tāpasassa paggayha so añjalimuttamassa;
anya-e1207n:454: Disvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ narindo devātidevassa sakatrajassa;
anya-e1207n:457: Yadā’si rañño puthuvappamaṅgalaṃ tadā puraṃ devapuraṃ’va sajjitaṃ;
anya-e1207n:458: Vibhūsitā tā janatā manoramā samāgatā tassa niketamuttamaṃ.
anya-e1207n:460: Vibhūsitaṅgo janatāhi tāhi so purakkhato bhūsanabhūsitatrajaṃ;
anya-e1207n:464: Sayāpayitvā bahimaṅgalaṃ taṃ udikkhituṃ dhātigaṇā gamiṃsu.
anya-e1207n:467: Nisajja dhīro sayane manuññe’jhānaṃ samāpajji katāvakāso.
anya-e1207n:469: Suvaṇṇabimbaṃ viya taṃ nisinnaṃ chāyañca tassā ṭhitame’va disvā;
anya-e1207n:473: Savandanaṃ me dutiya’nti vatvā puttassa pāde sirasā’bhivandi.
anya-e1207n:508: Sudassanīyaṃ viya nandanaṃ vanaṃ manoramuyyānama’gā mahāyaso.
anya-e1207n:539: Rājentaṃ sataraṃsi’ṃva rājaṃ disvā kathe si’daṃ.
anya-e1207n:541: ‘‘Yesaṃ sūnu ayaṃ dhīro yā ca jāyā imassa tu;
anya-e1207n:542: Te sabbe nibbutā nūna sadā’nūnaguṇassa ve’’.
anya-e1207n:544: Itī’disaṃ giraṃ sutvā manuññaṃ tāya bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1207n:547: Sītalaṃ vimalaṃ hāriṃ hāraṃ taṃ rativaḍḍhanaṃ;
anya-e1207n:575: So channo patigaṇhitvā taṃ giraṃ tena bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1207n:581: Pattharitvāna gacchantaṃ saddaṃ taṃ sakalaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e1207n:582: Sabbe suragaṇā tasmiṃ sotuṃ nā’daṃsu kassaci.
anya-e1207n:585: Passitvā paṭhamaṃ gantvā pacchā buddho bhavāma’haṃ.
anya-e1207n:605: Samattho assa ko tassā jahituṃ dehasampadaṃ;
anya-e1207n:609: Iti abravi channo so bhūpālassa yasassino.
anya-e1207n:624: Bhaveyya vivaṭaṃ dvāraṃ yena kenaci no sace.
anya-e1207n:633: Tassa cittaṃ viditvāna moditā gamane subhe;
anya-e1207n:639: ‘‘Mā nikkhami mahāvīra ito te sattame dine;
anya-e1207n:646: Gaccha tvami’dha mā tiṭṭha na’mhi rajjenamatthiko.
anya-e1207n:673: Itthaṃ tamhi pathe ramme vattamāne mahāmahe;
anya-e1207n:701: Patvā rājagahaṃ dhīro piṇḍāya cari subbato.
anya-e1207n:706: Ko’yaṃ sakko nukho brahmā māro nāgo’tiādinā;
anya-e1207n:713: Tamhā so ākulī katvā gantvā paṇḍavapabbataṃ.
anya-e1207n:725: Dhammaṃ desehi mayhanti buddho hutvā anuttaro.
anya-e1207n:740: Baliṃ dammī’ti gantvāna disvā tā dīpaduttamaṃ.
anya-e1207n:742: Dovo’ti saññāya udaggacittā pāyāsapātiṃ pavarassa datvā;
anya-e1207n:743: ‘‘Āsiṃsanā ijjhiyathā hi mayhaṃ tuyhampi sā sāmi samijjhitū’ti.’’
anya-e1207n:745: Icce’vaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā gatā tamhā varaṅganā;
anya-e1207n:799: Atha naṃ abbhutaṃ disvā mahāpañño vicintayi.
anya-e1207n:801: ‘‘Maṃsalohitamaṭṭhi ca nahārū ca taco ca me;
anya-e1207n:814: Vījayanto ṭhito tattha mandaṃ mandaṃ tigāvutaṃ.
anya-e1207n:826: Vattamāne tadā māro pāpimā iti cintayi.
anya-e1207n:884: Tampi disvā sasoko so gantvā dhīrassa santikaṃ;
anya-e1207n:890: Ko sakkhī’ti pavutto so ime sabbe’ti sakkhino;
anya-e1207n:896: Ko te siddhattha sakkhī’ti atha tenā’tulena’pi;
anya-e1207n:914: Taṃ mārasenaṃ sabhayaṃ sasokaṃ palāyamānaṃ iti devasaṅghā;
anya-e1207n:915: Disvāna mārassa parājayo’yaṃ jayo’ti siddhattha kumārakassa.
anya-e1207n:945: Ñatvā tāsaṃ vitakkaṃ taṃ sametuṃ santamānaso.
anya-e1207n:961: Mūle’pi rājayatanassa tassa tasmiṃ samāpattisukhampi vindaṃ;
anya-e1207n:977: Āsevaṃ takkaṇaṃ dhammaṃ imaṃ me paṭivijjhituṃ.
anya-e1207n:986: Dānaṃ nāma na dinnañca natthi sīlaṃ arakkhitaṃ.
anya-e1207n:992: Chejjādiṃ pāpunattena pāramī natthi kāci me.
anya-e1207n:995: Na kampittha ayaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ sarato’pi ca.
anya-e1207n:998: Na kampittha pakampittha pacchime pana yāmake.
anya-e1207n:1019: Nassati vata bho loko iti loko vinassati.
anya-e1207n:1050: Yasassī migadāyamuttamaṃ tahiṃ tapassī atha pañcavaggiyā.
anya-e1207n:1070: Samatthā nahi saṇṭhātuṃ sakāya katikāya te;
anya-e1207n:1184: Atha yodhasahassena tampi pesesi so’pi ca;
anya-e1207n:1220: Suṇitvā madhuraṃ tassa giraṃ lokahite rato;
anya-e1207n:1229: Dine dine vasitvāna yojane yojane jino;
anya-e1207n:1230: Dvīhi māsehi sampatto buddho jātapuraṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1207n:1242: Susajjitaṃ puraṃ patvā munindo taṃ manoramaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1257: Idaṃ vatvā nisīdiṃsu katvā te purato tato;
anya-e1207n:1260: Tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā ‘‘na maṃ vandanti ñātayo;
anya-e1207n:1276: Bhūsite’kāsi te sabbe sākiya’ akaruṃ tathā.
anya-e1207n:1311: ‘‘Sakyapuṅgava te ne’sa vaṃso mā cara mā cara;
anya-e1207n:1312: Vaṃse putte’karājā’pi na piṇḍāya carī pure.’’
anya-e1207n:1336: Ahampa’jja na gaccheyyaṃ save bimbāya mandiraṃ.
anya-e1207n:1345: Pakampitā hemalatā’va bimbā bimbadharā satthu samīpa’māga.
anya-e1207n:1350: Rājā satthu pavedesi bimbāyā’ti bahuṃ guṇaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1362: ‘‘Sukhā’va chāyā te me’’ti uggirantaṃ giraṃ piyaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1363: ‘‘Dāyajjaṃ me dadāhī’ti dāyajjaṃ me dadāhi ca’’.
anya-e1207n:1394: Gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ dhammaṃ suṇitvā vimalaṃ varaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1404: Vihāre pavare datvā kārāpetvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1207n:1424: Citraṃ gandhakuṭiṃ varaṃ suvipulaṃ kāresi bhūsekharaṃ.
anya-e1207n:1447: Dūtaṃ pāhesi so satthā sutvā dūtassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e1207n:1453: Kumārā purato satthu nikkhamiṃsu surā yathā.
anya-e1207n:1490: Iti vipulayaso so tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā,
anya-e1207n:1608: Citaṃ yaṃ racayantena jinassa caritaṃ mayā;
anya-e1207n:1612: Tena saddhiṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ vindanto mahatiṃ siriṃ.
anya-e1207n:1623: Vyākato tena buddho yaṃ hessatīti anāgate;
anya-e1207n:1626: Saṃsāre saṃsaranto hi kapparukkho ca pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1636: Mocayitvā varaṃ khemaṃ pāpuṇyeṃ sivaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e1207n:1645: Therena racitaṃ etaṃ sabbha saṃsevitaṃ sadā.
